website_summaries.verdict: These fun, colorful headphones are comfortable enough to wear all day long.
pros: Adjustable headband with cushioned ear cups
Ear cups flex to fit your ears comfortably
cons: Some users feel that these headphones are too large for them

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed by how comfortable these headphones were. They look awesome and work great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Comfy with good sound
customer_reviews.text: I've had these less than 24 hours but I'm so in love. I take public transportation to work and buses are surprisingly loud. My noise canceling ear buds weren't cutting it. I also live that they don't squeeze my head. I know some people complained they were loose but they feel great after prolonged wear.
customer_reviews.author: Loribelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for me but my 5 year old can wear them also and they fit really well and dont slip. These cancel outside noise out really well and have great sound quality. There is also padding at the top part to make it extra comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product that stands up to a rough 8 year boy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these almost a year ago (it will be a year in August). These headphones have held up surprisingly well especially for the price. I bought them for my 8 year old. Since he is extremely hard on headphones I did not want to buy an expensive pair. He has managed to keep these ones in tact and has used them a lot. I would highly recommend these and if they do break I will buying another pair just like these because of the great quality. I think that anything that survives a year or more with a rough 8 year old boy is worth buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Lynd

customer_reviews.title: They're great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the headphones for a couple of days and I am very pleased. I have used it both to jam to my tunes and also to do a video conference with the built in mic. I was heard clearly so I had no issues with the mic. Also, the green color is super cute and they are comfortable. My other headset squeezes my ears too much and leaves me with a little pain after a couple of hours. This one is totally fine, the only thing is that I wish the headset was a bit smaller as it seems my average sized head is too small for them and they fall a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great value headset!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked these out and couldn't be happier with them. She's gone through 3 pairs of ear buds so we thought we'd try headsets. Sound quality is great and they appear to be well made. The blue is a beautiful cornflower that my daughter findd fashionable. Overall very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: cin.deadlee

customer_reviews.title: Great noise-cancelling over-ear earphones
customer_reviews.text: I loved these earphones for flights to Florida from Michigan and back. I couldn’t hear other people including my husband talking right beside me. So I got to listen to my movies and my old iPod in peace for hours. Great value! I do enjoy hearing individual instruments in my earphones. That was not something I noticed hearing with these.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelionzen

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: Their customer service is amazing. Despite amazon not wanting to solve this problem, they reached out and solved it quickly. I’m very happy with them. I bought these for my classroom for students to watch videos independently and despite being used with care and being hung on a headphone stand they stopped working just one month after purchase. It's outside of the return window so there's nothing I can do.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: Wow, out of the box they sound almost as good as my beats headphones, no exaggeration
customer_reviews.author: Buddhaman

customer_reviews.title: You had better like green
customer_reviews.text: I use the headphones plugged into the earphone jack of a computer which does not have Bluetooth. . As I have some hearing loss, hearing conversation is more comfortable with these headphones than the speakers. The sound quality is very good although that depends a lot on the source. An audiophile would probably not find the earphone to be extreme high fidelity. What i dislike is that the cord always gets tangled but that seems to be true of most equipment. There is no volume control, but I can always use the control on the sound card or player.
customer_reviews.author: Observer

customer_reviews.title: They were great at first but after a month
customer_reviews.text: They were great at first but after a month, the headphone jack broke off in my iPad. I can't get the piece out, leaving my iPad without sound. The seller offered to replace my broken headphones and they were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hawley

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this set of headphones twice for our son. They have only been used to listen to items on a kindle. They have both broken within weeks of receiving them with very little use. I am very disappointed with this product. UPDATE: The customer service response I got after writing this was quick and kind. The seller graciously refunded me. While I still can not recommend this particular product, I highly recommend working with this seller as they seem to be people of integrity interested in working with their customers to make sure you are satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price, but with more info on how to use it's features, would have been much more useful.
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones very much, and would have given them 5 stars, but the manual is useless. It only gives the specifications of the headphones and the microphone, but gives you no clue as to how to use the microphone, or how to take advantage of the "deep hi-fi bass" the adds are so proud of. The headphones are very good for the price, but could have been much more if they had shared the "secrets" of how to use the features that would have made them more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones after the head strap on my old inexpensive headphones broke. When I first used these headphones to listen to music, the sound quality was very disappointing -- it sounded like the music was being muffled through inches of foam or cardboard. My old inexpensive headphones still work, so I did a side-by-side comparison of sound quality using the same song. The difference in sound quality is HUGE - my old cheap headphones sound loud and crystal clear - these headphones have much lower volume and the sound is muddled and indistinct. I guess you get what you pay for - next time I'll spend the money necessary to obtain good-quality headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap garbage. headphones showed up packaged well BUT......They ARE NOT OVER THE EAR HEADPHONES. I chose these because they were supposed to be "Over the ear headphones" They are not........these are "On ear headphones" The ear pads are EXTREMELY UNCOMFORTABLE cause your ears to get sore after only a few minutes of wearing them. Pretty much every feature that this product boasts in the add is a complete lie.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Thomas Curtsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutomer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have order this product once before and they work wonderful. The product also has a great look to it. My family enjoyed them so much we ordered another pair. The second pair that came in did not work. Now, I am giving this five stars, because although the second pair did not work , the response I receive from the company was what customer services should all try to achieve. They responded within a day and not only did they apologize for the issue they did not blame the problem on the customer. They also are replacing the item. I want to thank the company for how they have handle this issue.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU ARE BUYING THESE TO USE DAILY DONT EVEN BOTHER!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter to use at school, they use them daily. She is not a little kid and takes care of her things one side went out within 45 days of use. These will not last long term. I’ve tried to use the warranty but there’s no contact email or number. MY ADVISE, DONT LEAVE A REVIEW UNTIL AFTER YOUVE HAD THESE HEADPHONES AT LEAST 3-4 MONTHS WITHOUT ISSUES
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple pairs of these for my kids and they've turned out to be a much better quality than I'd expected. They're not pro-level or anything like that but they have a nice build quality and the sound is surprisingly rich. They fit my 10 year old perfect...a 'tad' large for my 4 year old but not so much that she can't use them. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Agent_CooperTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! Bought a set for my sister and liked them so well I bought a set for myself. I like the fact that they're single wired. Very comfortable, and the blue color is so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: B. Levi

customer_reviews.title: Good ones for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid these are very good headphones. I bought them for my 8 year old son and he likes them. My daughter says they distort at high volumes and to that I say "Good" They are plenty big, so far none of us adjusted them past the smallest setting, if you like the strap pushing on the top of your head these aren't for you probably, but I bought em' so I didn't have to hear the worlds stupidest YouTube videos and for that they work fantastic at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Logger Lee

customer_reviews.title: Will you see use headphones for about 90 days and ...
customer_reviews.text: Will you see use headphones for about 90 days and one side quit working
customer_reviews.author: JAMES P MEDENDORP

customer_reviews.title: Thank you :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought for for my daughter and she loves them. Update was working great for about 3 weeks. After 2 weeks one of the paddings came off but was still working. Then a week after that they stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Rhines

customer_reviews.title: Outperformed their modest price
customer_reviews.text: My father (97 yrs. old) needed to replace his old head phones that he used to hear the TV more clearly. When we first used these, they sounded "garbled" and ofter pulling on the connection and moving it out about the width of a hair, the earphones work perfectly. Listening to voices on TV is crystal clear and I was extremely surprised at how well it sounded. This was one purchase that outperforms what I thought we'd be getting for $13.00. f
customer_reviews.author: Marcia A. Melbert

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality for these headphones is great, but HOLY MOTHER OF PEARL it hurts sooooo ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality for these headphones is great, but HOLY MOTHER OF PEARL it hurts sooooo bad. I can't wear it for more than 20 minutes before my head feels like it's warping into another dimension. I don't have a big head either! Average size heads may find this too small. Also, the pads are perfectly parallel, but our ears naturally slope outwards, so there is a lot of pressure on the tips of the ear, but it is hardly touching the front where the hole is. I ended up just using earbuds as my go to headphones because these were just too painful.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Woah!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! 15 dollar headphones have NEVER impressed me so much. Sound quality is superb while playing my PS4. I can tell where everyone is easily. They seemed to be made very well. I was nervous originally as I have large head. However, they fit great and could even fit a larger head. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Currie

customer_reviews.title: No noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very loose. I have to turn the volume up to hear what I am listening to because they do not fit properly. The worst thing is that you have to make sure it is quiet around you because it does not cancel ANY OTHER NOISE. You can hear everything around you along with what you are listening to. If I still have the box, I would return these. Don't waste your money. These suck! I do not like writing reviews about products that I don't like, but this one is so bad, I had to let all know!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Dean

customer_reviews.title: We have two pairs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new set of headphones and bought these and really liked them. The were good cancelling out extraneous noise and had great sound quality. My wife wanted to listen to her bloggers (and not disturb me) so I let her try mine. She loved them. I bought her a set for her own personal use and she has used them numerous time and loves them; maybe even more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: On The Huron

customer_reviews.title: Green earphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of these headphones for my 1st grade classroom because the ones they provide us are very old and constantly breaking. Although I haven't had the kids use them yet, they seem to be very well made. The headphones them self are very solid and are exactly like the picture. I think they definitely are more fitted towards a younger person, as the ear muffs are on the smaller side but they still fit on my head comfortably. If they hold up to my class of 22 I will definitely be purchasing a few more pairs. Also, the green is a great color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mic stopped working w/i a few months
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these headphones... right up until the mic stopped working. Unfortunately, I work remotely from my team so absolutely need a mic. The sound quality is great though and LOVE the color (got the green) and my colleagues commented on how great they looked... up until I couldn't use them anymore. I ended up giving them to my daughter who uses them for listening to music and doesn't need a mic.
customer_reviews.author: Shef W

customer_reviews.title: Meeh
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This headphone was made for people with BIG heads. My head is by no means small, but I cannot feel the top band cushion with it on. This is also a truly a light weight headphone. All I feel is the cushion around my ears. It cannot fold for easy storage. No volume control on the cable. The sound is base heavy, with some of the highs on the verge of breaking/scratchy. It will do the job I need, but if you need balanced, high quality sound, look elsewhere. But for $15, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking but too big and too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Man, these are a good-looking headphone! And now I've learned that one should not buy headphones based solely on how they look. Okay the good stuff: I thought the sound quality was totally fine, nothing to write home about, but definitely decent. The look and color (I got blue) are super cool-looking. But.... ultimately I had to return these because they were too big on my small-ish, female head and because of that (or maybe in addition to that) the ear pieces were so uncomfortable. I wore them on an airplane and my ears were aching after like 20 minutes. If anyone can find some headphones that fit womens' heads, please let me know! I've yet to find the goldmine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Does Everything It's Supposed to Do
customer_reviews.text: My first over the head, headphones and I'm glad to say they served me well. They were very loud, so loud in fact that I had to be conscious of the people around me while on public transportation. It is lightweight but can be a bit bulky. I liked that the cord was the only side and that decreased the chance of it getting tangled, which is something that happens more often with my other headphones. I've had this headphone for two years until the left ear stopped working (I'm guessing natural causes); however, that doesn't change my thoughts on this headphone. I'd definitely buy these again! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kaycia S.

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price, but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these since August. The sound quality is pretty good for such a cheap pair of headphones. They're not as uncomfortable as my other pair, though they do start to hurt my ears after a few hours. My biggest complaint is the long-term quality: despite hiving a built in mic, they aren't very good for phone calls, and they're starting to make bad static noises while I'm on a call that makes it difficult for the person on the other end to hear me. Wish I'd gotten some kind of replacement plan so that I could trade them in for a better set.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: 😔
customer_reviews.text: As much as I wanted to like these, I was disappointed all except for the overall look. It's a nice, light earphone. Great color and style. And great price. Buuuut, the sound quality isn't very good and theres a slight pitch and scratch almost as if it were nails on a chalk board sound that you hear when listening to music or media. The earphones itself does have an adjustment but still were to big for my head. I gave them to my teenage sons to share and their ok with it, but overall agreed with me. Sighhhhhhh
customer_reviews.author: MsKit

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are pretty good. The quality of sound is as expected for 12 dollar headphones. I had to return my first set because of some weird sound in it but was promptly sent another one (even before I had returned the first) which was surprising and pleasing. The actual ear foam is a bit harder than I am used to. I have a pair of Bose headphones which are of epic quality and sound, however, needed a second set to take to work in a bag and could take some abuse and wouldn't kill me if stolen at work. These fit that bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kartik

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up, down, maybe?
customer_reviews.text: Update== after giving the product 2 stars, the company emailed me and offered a 30% money return on the price if I give a better review. I’ll ad another star because of that but I’m still returning for full credit.. Floppy plastic. Also, unless you have hydrocephalus, the headphones will be too big, even on the smallest setting. Boxing up at the moment to return.
customer_reviews.author: AZWILDCHILD

customer_reviews.title: It's actually pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's actually pretty good for the price. I'm used to my boyfriend's headphones, which are big and cushion-y. So wearing this one took a bit to get used to. I do like the size of it however. Not too big that it looks huge on my head. The sound quality is good. My only problem with this is that there is already a problem with the wiring. I only just got it yesterday and the sound is already cutting out from the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Rorie A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for 4 months, then...
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones, good quality, nice padding. Helps to keep out external sounds, but they don't leak sound to bother others sitting nearby. Unfortunately, lost the right channel just shy of 4 months of light usage. Checked the cable and all connections, all are ok, but when wiggling the place where the cord goes into the headphones, the right channel comes back briefly, but cuts out again after a short while. Wish they were made a bit more durable, but I guess for the price one can't complain too much. Unfortunately, I wouldn't recommend these- might spend a bit more to get something that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: My old Sennheiser HD202 headphones got damaged, and those now cost about 3x what they used to, so I tried these because of good reviews. I don’t know what kind of head shape the people who say these are comfortable have, but most people’s ears face slightly forward on their heads, and these aren’t made for that at all. The cups rotate forward/back very little, so they are pushing hard on the backs of your ears and not touching the fronts. Also, I’m not an audiophile but the sound seems decidedly worse.
customer_reviews.author: Stef & David

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Soft & light on my head. Adjustments for fit are good. Does fall partly off my head when I shake my head (I am a thin 17 year old girl). Sound quality is great. Blocks human talking completely when I have my music on. I can push one of the headphones off one ear to hear a conversation in that ear and have music in the other ear. They stay half on pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are pretty good, the sound quality is really good, although I can't judge the quality very much because I haven't had any expensive headphones before. The pads don't cancel any noise at all, though, and there is very little padding on the middle, making it basically plastic on your ears. Very uncomfortable to wear and I was lucky it was only $15 with Prime... Definitely not worth $60.
customer_reviews.author: P. T. Sano

customer_reviews.title: Good back to school product, better priced and good material
customer_reviews.text: All want to say is just a nice product for that price. I was looking for a regular back to school supplies list and my son sitting next to me asked for this. I thought let’s buy as it’s not expensive for the description. Once received it’s so good that my kids friend’s dad also asked for the details. My kid is used it 2 days before the school started and is given to teacher as part of supplies list. Won’t rate for noise cancellation at all as it’s not meant for it .
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: My son loved these when we first got them
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these when we first got them. The color was great and they worked wonderfully! I am sad to report they broke after about 3 weeks of use. The end that plugs into your device snapped off. I'm not saying they weren't played with a little roughly, but I had hoped they would survive longer than they did.
customer_reviews.author: beccaboo

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, this is my second pair that I’m reviewing as my first pair’s wire got shredded by accident. However, I enjoyed them so much that I decided to order them again. For headphones this well-crafted, you get them for a fair price in my opinion. It’s everything I like in a pair of headphones; a long cord, good volume, and pretty durable. It doesn’t have a button to pause the music like most corded headphones do, but that doesn’t bother me personally. It’s a good pair of headphones for $14-16 dollars, depending on color. If you need a set of headphones for a reasonable price, go with these, they won’t dissapoint.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the Price
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for some headphones that have really good quality for an amazing-fair price then look no further I ordered a pair roughly 18 months ago but they became damaged last month where only one ear worked and internal wiring became broken - or at least I assume. But to be fair that was probably from me because I was rough with them from time to time and the cord got the worst of it. So if you treat these headphones right then they should have a 2 year + shelf life at the very least
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A great choice.
customer_reviews.text: Ear buds were giving my mom some ear pain, so I got her these. She loves them and uses them to watch TV. They block out outside noise, and help her hear very well. She says she has the volume on lower than she did with the earbuds, and everything is much clearer. She finds them comfortable. I tried them on and feel they are comfortable as well. The foam that covers the ear could be softer, though, but I'm a little picky. No complaints on sound quality, they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive headphones that do the job !
customer_reviews.text: Needed just a simple good quality headphone to listen quietly to my computer while my wife works nearby... this product is very good for tone and quality. Arrived quickly with no problems. Bought the green color because they were a little cheaper than the regular ones offered but I'm certain that ANY of Dastin's products will be good...
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have good sound quality, but they are uncomfortable. The head piece is too big. It is adjustable to make it larger, but at the smallest there is still a gap between it and my head. (I am a normal sized adult woman). The ear parts are too small and don't completely cover my ears. The foam padding is not thick enough, so the hard "speaker" part pushes on my ears. Just a weird mix of too big and too small. I like to wear headphones while I work, and I can only wear them about an hour until they hurt too much.
customer_reviews.author: D. Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: My son in law was setting up this headset for my granddaughter and once he got it working on her iPad he commented she had to try them that the ear pieces were nice and soft and very comfortable to wear. She loves them. Her father was sitting next to her and trying to explain something and she couldn't understand what he was saying so the noise cancellation was working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We loved this headset until it stopped working. My kids used it for school work a couple of times a day, but now sound only comes out of the side with the cord attached. ETA: The first one we received stopped working after 2 months, but this company graciously reached out to us and sent us a new one. My kids are enjoying this new headphones and so far everything is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all for noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely useless for noise cancellation. I was looking for something to block out the TV and the dogs playing with their squeaky toys in the other room while I'm working on the computer. These just muffle the noise. Earplugs work better than these. I don't know how they work for sound- I haven't tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have ever had for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My initial thoughts are these: They look great, the sound is completely acceptable, they comfortably fit over my ears, the cord length is nice. You can't beat them for the price. I am a non professional user and I think they will work just fine for me. I'll update this review in the future should any problems arise.
customer_reviews.author: Mousehouse1950

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of shopping around, I bought these for my six year old niece who listens to music and videos a lot on her iPad. They arrived fast and in perfect condition. The headphones are very nice, and they were a big hit with my niece. In fact, she wore them most of the afternoon at the family gathering where she received them even though she didn't have her iPad with her! They adjusted to fit her well, without help from an adult. I would definitely purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones that provide sound isolation at a reasonable price. Light weight with single sided connecting cable makes them comfortable and convenient to use. The size seams quite large. I’m an adult male and they fit on the smallest width. I would imagine these would be loose on a person with an average to smaller size head.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good for Listening to Music
customer_reviews.text: Things I like about this set of headphones: plug in and go. Good for casual music listening. I try not to turn up the volume too much to save what's left of my hearing, and these allow me to plug in and enjoy my music without muss or fuss. Thing I don't care for too much: I like headphones with "L" and "R" easy-to-see; this seems to be a feature that's not in vogue in the moment for cost-effective over-the-ear headphones, including this set.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Lasts well, purchasing again
customer_reviews.text: A good pair of headphones, lasted me through college and to a job. Stands up to near constant wear. I do recommend wiping down the parts that touch hair & ears at least once a week, to wipe away sweat and oils. The lime green color is lovely. Better than a lot of others I've seen. I'm actually purchasing another pair because my first has started to go single-ear-sound if I don't hold the cord correctly. And this time I'll get a protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphone
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphone. I just bought this for my child’s school. It is a replacement for old one. I bought this one for almost the same price compared to old one but this has better quality and better noise. It stays on your head without making you bothered. Shipping is fast too. Color is lighter on the amazon picture but original headphone has more darker color
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good stereo sound quality. Like the length of the cord - not too short and not too long. Comfortable to wear. Just wish pads over the ears were a bit bigger to cover full ear. The size the are adds pressure to my earnings and hurts after wearing for 30 min or more.
customer_reviews.author: Flowering Shrub

customer_reviews.title: Loved the sound quality of the headphones but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound quality of headphones, and everything seemed fine up until I did a video call, where I received a significant amount of feedback (static) when using the headphones. I thought it might have been the connection, but upon playing songs on spotify, it still persisted. I'm not sure it is the case for all, maybe I just got a bad set? Will see how it goes, but I've only had it for 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: save your money and buy a good one this is garbage
customer_reviews.text: no matter how long I charge this thing up, from a couple of hours to a couple of days, it only works for a couple of hours. Then when it does cancel out the loud noise at the gun range,, it takes almost 5 or 6 seconds for the earphone to turn back on so you can hear people talking. Save your money on this thing and buy a good one1
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 weeks of buying both soft ear pieces came off. Fine, I superglue them back on and they worked just fine. Then right at 2 weeks one of the speakers in the ear stopped working. Bummer because my daughter loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: They say there comfortable and sound quality is ok
customer_reviews.text: So I bought two pair of these headphones for my kids. One of them is 9 and the other is 12, needless to say they are rough on headphones and I was looking for an inexpensive pair to replace the last set they had. They have had these headphones for about a month and have had no issues with them, they use them nearly everyday. They say there comfortable and sound quality is ok. I would give all 5 stars but it's only been a month if the last 3 months then I would give it all five stars and would definitely say it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Guzman

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can't beat them
customer_reviews.text: Well they sound alright not much on the low end but I use them on a guitar amp I've only had them for about a week so I really don't know how long they last but a week in an no problem. My advice is if you want banging bass an a crisp sound then spend the extra money because You get what you pay for. I'd buy these again an would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Joe w.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but cord broke easily.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome! I even ended up using them a lot. The only problems I found was the cord broke and tip of cord bent very easily. I do have kids who use them for video games but the cord only lasted a month. The headphones also only took about a month or so to start stretching out as well but only slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Mom Blog

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: My son has ASD and goes through headphones every other week. All different kinds of headphones too, I don't want to even guess how much we've spent in total...point is, these $14 headphones are his FAVORITE! He is so much more calm and relaxed with them and actually said they are the most comfortable. Might buy another one just as back up
customer_reviews.author: Candi Myers

customer_reviews.title: Got these today - my first impression is very comfortable - and I had to turn sound down - ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these today - my first impression is very comfortable - and I had to turn sound down - audio is superb - if they break quickly or something I'll update review but this is my first impression. I just tried to test out mic - it only has the one line in and the mic doesn't seem to work - which is a bummer but I'd so rarely use it - the headphones are the real purchase here - and they are great
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is clear and crisp, Great sounding stereo headphones !!
customer_reviews.text: I have decided to try these on once more after my really bad first review. First, customer service reached out to me and I consider that exceptional! These headphones produce a very good quality sound. I listen to music at my desk and the overall clarity and sound is OUTSTANDING !! I must have made a mistake with the extension jack/cord that use {the extension that bought seperately was defective. Folks, the sound is very clear. These are a very good deal and I have absolutely no complaints at all concerning the headphones. I feel bad about my first review being low. These are a 5 star set of headphones and that I guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these headphones for my kids (6 & 8) they hate earbuds, I wanted some that were comfy and good quality they. I found these and they had great reviews. I ordered them for a Christmas present so they haven't tried them yet, but I did and they are awesome and very comfortable the color is great. They are going to love it and can't wait for them to open this. When I ordered they shipped these almost the same day I got it 2 or 3 days later!
customer_reviews.author: L Messina

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality for the price, bought them so my son could watch Movies in the car, however he’s already found multiple uses...great sound quality, light and pretty comfy, might get myself a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L

customer_reviews.title: These are nice headphones but they are big
customer_reviews.text: These are nice headphones but they are big. They don’t adjust small enough for me to stay in place. I had to wrap a bandana around the top to make it smaller. I do have a small size head but I’m 46 so I think it’s pretty average for an adult. The seller contacted me regarding my feedback. He wanted to make things right and appreciated the feedback since they continually are looking for ways to make their products great. It was nice to see the seller be concerned about his customers. Would definitely buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stock

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love my headset! I use it on my Victrola that plays CDs, radio and vinyls and the sound is so enhanced in all modes. The set is very comfortable to wear. The yummy blue color is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: linda hansen

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack broke off in device.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed decent for the price but headphone jack broke off in the iPad within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: You get exactly what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They are mostly comfortable. The sound quality is exactly what you would expect from paying this much. They have lots of lows but they are muddy, no mids, and the highs are ok. I use them to block out noise at work so I can concentrate on programming. If they broke I’d buy another pair just because they are cheap and I don’t want to spend much money. Edit: They did reach out to me about my review and made an offer for me to return them for a full refund. I declined. They are good enough. The customer service must be half way decent if they reach out for 3 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphone
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheaper headphone for my kids computer class. Blue is his favorite color. This headphone does his job. Comfortable, good looking,incredible price. My boy likes it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, good sounds for those of us with craniums on the large side!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am pleased with these. They sound surprisingly good, and they are very comfortable. I despise earbuds has don't care to drop a couple hunnid on some Beats. Warning: if you have a small head these will probably fall off.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarGuy69

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids for 'virtual schooling'
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a couple of these for the kids for their virtual schooling, and the kids love them. The single cord system means less tangles, and it's easier for the kids to align them properly. I haven't tested them extensively, but these aren't exactly studio headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: My ears are relatively small, yet when I tried it on the plastic speakers inside pressed against my ears instead of the cushions which made it extremely uncomfortable. I knew immediately there is no way I could wear these if I could not adjust the cushions. So when I tried to adjust the cushions the left cushion just slid right off the speaker! I didn't even have a chance to undo the cable. Only reason I'm leaving it two stars is because I have no idea how the sound quality is (I wasn't even going to try it out because it was so uncomfortable). Next time I'll stick to the more familiar brands. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Pass it on

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Got these to assist me with working from home. Helps allow me to do my job and not be disturbed by my kids
customer_reviews.author: K.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've owned a lot of headsets far more expensive over the years yet this product can hold its own against any of them. The sound quality exceeds my expectations and the fit is very comfortable. Shipping was fast as well. Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Just One person.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in price and in quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't interested investing any significant amount of money into headphones, so I've been buying cheap brands most of my life. these were my go to for the last year. The important thing to remember is you get what you pay for. The sound quality is okay enough, and the fit is comfortable, but the build is junk. The longest a pair has lasted for me is 2-3 months, the shortest being 1 week, and I ended up having to reorder so many times that I think now I may as well invest in a slightly more expensive, but higher quality brand, and I would be paying about the same amount.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sleek looking but possibly dangerous?
customer_reviews.text: Are these headphones designed to give you an electric shock? I have experienced shocks from these headphones when moving around at my desk while the headphones are plugged into my laptop. I mean the sound quality is good but the electrical stimulation is less than ideal
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work, hoping they would fit comfortably over my ears. I previously had JLab headphones and the ear pads pinched my ears between my glasses legs and the "squishy"pads. These fit perfectly over my ears and the pads are soft as well. The only downside is that they don't cancel noise at all, but I'm in a position where i can frequently pause my work to let the loudness pass, then get back to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We are impressed with the sound quality of these headphones. Only had them for a few days, so the real test will be their durability. They are comfortable and seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: good for the price, not for kids or adults with smaller heads
customer_reviews.text: nice sound, good bass. but if you have a smaller head (or for children) i wouldn’t recommend them. i have probably an average sized, if not slightly larger than normal head for a woman and i’m using these on the smallest size. if they were any bigger, i’d be returning them. otherwise, a nice pair of headphones for the price. minor issue...they’re not as light a color of blue as pictured. but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: world traveler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cheap over the ears headphones!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a pair of cheap over the ear headphones, these are it! I wanted a pair that I could use at work to drown out coworkers chatter and keyboard clacking. However, I did not want complete noise cancellation (avoiding sneaking up coworkers). These are perfect. Super comfortable over the ears and the sound quality is great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jessdigg

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these headphones and they are great. Having hearing aids is a problem at times. These are comfortable, and they do not press so hard as to hurt with my hearing aids in, which is wonderful. The sound quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Comfy headphones
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these headphones for about a month and the left side stopped outputting audio unless I have the cord at a super specific angle. I’ve been looking for ways to contact the seller for a new pair or a refund but cannot find anything. They headphones are good overall I think I just got a bum pair. So fingers crossed they respond the the review.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hall

customer_reviews.title: Broke with 2 months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought my head phones Nov 14, 2018 and the ear phone opposite input wire died today. 01/18/2019. Cheap is what you pay and cheap is what you get. It seems one can sell anything on Amazon without regard to quality. dabob
customer_reviews.author: Dabob

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use at work. They sit on my desk so they’re not tossed around or abused. They are used maybe 10 hours a week. This week (right after my return window closes, of course), they stopped working in one ear. There’s a short in the wire so I can sometimes get sound if I jiggle the wire. Will not be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my office for webinars once a week and to listen to music. They work real well at canceling out office noise. The fit is really comfortable and very easy to adjust. Overall I am extremely satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jean Suhodolsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent and comfortable set of headphones at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of this headphone. Feels very comfortable and isolates from the outside very well. The sound quality is over what I expected. And the price is great. Although it looks huge, it is really light. The color of the product is also super cute.
customer_reviews.author: rabia

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! Sparks!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good. The comfort is so so, not great; however, about 30 days after purchase (outside the return window), I started to feel sharp pains in one side of my ear. That side headphone is letting out spark like static. I can hear it when it happens, like a pop, but it also shocks my ear, which hurts. It happens over and over again 2-10 minutes apart, but makes them unusable unless you like constant pain while using them.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G

customer_reviews.title: Great for listening to audiobooks while mowing the lawn
customer_reviews.text: I wear these headphones when I'm mowing the lawn using a riding lawnmower. They are connected to a tiny MP3 player that I use to listen to audiobooks. I can hear every word. I'm an adult female and find them just a little large across my head; they are adjusted to the shortest setting. This is okay for me, but they would definitely be too large for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Eweforia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome at first...update
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were awesome for my son at first. After about a month they started cutting in and out causing the video he was watching to pause every minute or so. The return window has closed so now we're stuck with them. Update: company contacted me after my review. Sent a new pair that works perfectly free of charge! Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!! AND A MUST BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my 14 yr old daughter, who’s challenged with I.D, for our vacation during travel time. Normally she doesn’t like anything on her head, however She loved these headphones!! Great sound and wonderful for the price. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kellta Royal

customer_reviews.title: Awful Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The noise cancellation is subpar and honestly, the sound quality is awful!! No bass at all. They’re huge, too; on the smallest size, they’re too big for my head. A bad purchase all around. Just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality. Think “am” radio
customer_reviews.text: When I plugged these headphones it into my phone it sounded like the difference between am and fm radio. Much less clear sound and quality. They also don’t block out much surrounding noise. The only reason I won’t return them is out of laziness since they are adequate for why I bought them, to plug into electronic drums for quiet play. I’ll never try to listen to music from my phone or computer with these though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are absolute garbage. They won't stay on your head if you move at all, the earpieces aren't comfortable, there is no way to control the volume, even with the sound all the way up you can still hear absolutely everything around you because the sound quality is horrible, and there is no way to pause the music/skip tracks (which even free headphones have that capability)
customer_reviews.author: Lyn21

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of headphones like these that wouldn't hurt my ears to wear and these are the ones! And they didn't cost an outrageous amount of money. They do exactly what I wanted and the sound is fantastic. Will buy a second pair for my wife so she will leave mine alone for me to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G. Price

product_meta.title: Ausdom Lightweight Over-Ear Wired HiFi Stereo Headphones with Built-in Mic Comfortable Leather Earphones- Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackDesigned for an excellent listening experience, Ausdom F01 wired headphones with around-ear cushion design can provide robust, immersive and Hi-fidelity sound. The design fits into lively, urban style and pace, let it be part of your music experience and life's best moments.

Immersive Hifi Sound
Equipped with 40mm powerful driver, the high quality, economical and over-ear stereo headphones provide your superior audio experience, clean well-balanced bass, clear mid-tones and treble. Designed for those who enjoy music with premium sound.

Lightweight, Comfortable Over Ear Design
Lightweight design allows you to listen to your music anywhere you go without having the bulky heavy feel. With soft leather ear cups and wrap around wearable over ear design, Ausdom wired headphones are customized for comfortable wearing experience.

Adjustable To Fit
Full size adjustable, padded headband allows easy customization and fits most people, such as growing kids, teens, students, adults, the elders, etc. 

Totally Hands-free
Built-in Microphone supports calls and music, so you can take hands-free calls and listen to music.

Wide Compatibility
Fully compatible with smartphones, laptops, PCs, CD players,Tablets and other 3.5mm jack android or IOS devices.

Specification
Item weight:160g/5.64ounces
Driver Unit: Φ40mm
Cord length: 4.25 ft/1.3m
Plug type: Φ3.5mm stereo
Built-in microphone: yes 
Sensitivity: 42±3dB
Impedance: ≤1.4KΩ
Frequency response: 100Hz-10,000Hz
Directivity: Omni-directional
Dimensions:7.4 x 6.9 x 1.3 inches
Size of the Earcup: Inner size: 1.4 x 1.8 inches; Outer size: 3 x 3.5 inches 

Package List:
1 x Full-size stereo headphones
1 x User manual
feature_bullets: Comfortable and Adjustable - The over ear soundproof padded ear cushions are specifically designed for maximum comfort and noise isolation. Soft ear pads for ergonomic around-ear fit, which can reduce the pressure on the ears. Adjustable 9 choices padded headband fits for various sizes. You can wear this full size over the ear headphones all day long at ease.
Stereo Headphones - The High-fidelity stereo sound benefits from the 40 mm audio driver, and you can enjoy gorgeous deep bass / Hi-Fi stereo sound feast. Just lose yourself in the music.
Built-in Mic and Hands-free Call - The built-in mic allows you to pick up any calls and enjoy voice chat or communication when listening to music. Never worry about missing any phone call.

Lightweight and Portable - The general weight of other headphones is about 10oz, our Hi-Fi headphones weight only 5.64oz, which is lighter for conveniently carrying, allowing you to take it to anywhere and enjoy all-day comfortable listening feast with this portable headphones.

Universal Wired Headphones - The 4.25ft (1.3m) long cord allows you to connect your wired headphones with devices by a universal 3.5 mm jack. AUSDOM over-ear Headphones is compatible with smartphones, laptops, PCs, CD players, Tablets and other 3.5 mm jack Android or iOS devices.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars3,504 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Microphone, stereo, noise-isolating, lightweight,portable,built-in mic,4.25ft long cord
